title: PRD: User Authentication System

decisions.decision: Use OAuth 2.0 for authentication instead of SAML
decisions.reasoning: OAuth is simpler to implement for MVP. SAML adds enterprise complexity we don't need yet. Our target customers are startups, not enterprise.

decisions.decision: Use Redis for session storage with 24-hour expiration
decisions.reasoning: Redis provides fast read/write for session data and supports automatic expiration.

transcript:
PRD: User Authentication System
Version: 1.0
Author: Sarah Chen
Date: April 10, 2026

## Overview
ShopFlow needs a secure authentication system for our e-commerce platform.

## Requirements

### REQ-AUTH-001: Authentication Method
The system shall use OAuth 2.0 for user authentication.

### REQ-AUTH-002: Session Management
User sessions shall be stored in Redis with a 24-hour expiration.

### REQ-AUTH-003: Social Login
The system shall support Google and GitHub as OAuth providers.
